concept.title: Installing
concept.shortdesc: You can install in containers or as RPMs directly on your host operating system. On Red Hat systems, you must have an active Red Hat subscription to proceed. You do not need such a subscription on CentOS.

conbody.p: After you install the , you must set the license type and accept the license agreement by using a REST Administration API. Until the license is accepted, the will not connect to MQTT endpoints.
For more information about using a REST Administration API to set the licensed usage and accept the license agreement, see .
